title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Revolut aims to take on Indian banks and their ‘criminal’ forex fees
items.description: Revolut plans to onboard 20 million users in India by 2030 and process more than $7 billion in transactions.

items.title: The 13 Best Power Bank Prime Day Deals
items.description: Banish battery anxiety for less with these power bank bargains from Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days.

items.title: The Sony WH-1000XM6 Get a Price Cut During Amazon's 2025 Prime Day Sales Event
items.description: The best noise-canceling headphones you can buy are on sale during Amazon Prime Day.

items.title: 30 Best Prime Day Tech Deals: Tablets, Accessories, and More
items.description: Take advantage of these discounts, courtesy of Amazon’s latest sale event, and nab WIRED’s favorite tech gadgets.

items.title: It's Prime Day, and WIRED is Live-Blogging The Best and Worst Of It
items.description: We're tracking Amazon Prime Day deals, trends, and the general state of American capitalism live throughout the Big Deal Days sale.

items.title: This Is the MacBook I'd Buy For Amazon Big Deal Days This Year
items.description: With new MacBooks on the horizon and Prime Day discounts here, here's my advice on what MacBooks to buy today.

items.title: Charles Schwab backs Singapore’s Qapita, a Carta challenger
items.description: Charles Schwab and Singapore-based Qapita have teamed up to launch a new service to help U.S. startups manage cap tables and employee stock plans.

items.title: You can’t libel the dead. But that doesn’t mean you should deepfake them.
items.description: "Please, just stop sending me AI videos of Dad," the late Robin Williams' daughter Zelda wrote on Instagram.

items.title: Wall Street analysts explain how AMD’s own stock will pay for OpenAI’s billions in chip purchases
items.description: AMD's unusual deal to finance OpenAI's chip purchases could grant the AI model maker up to $100 billion, analyst estimates.

items.title: Trump’s DOE proposes cutting billions in grants for GM, Ford, and lots of startups
items.description: Trump's Department of Energy wants to cancel billions more in awards that were granted by the Biden administration, and startups are in the crosshairs...
